title: Scooby-Doo! Shaggy's Showdown
overview: When the Scooby gang visits a dude ranch, they discover that it and the nearby town have been haunted by a ghostly cowboy, Dapper Jack, who fires real fire from his fire irons. The mystery only deepens when itâ€™s discovered that the ghost is also the long lost relative of Shaggy Rogers!
